results.description: Watch highlights as National League side Bromley come back from a goal down to earn a replay against League One's Bristol Rovers in the first round of the FA Cup.
results.title: FA Cup: Bristol Rovers 1-1 Bromley highlights

results.description: Chris Bush's late leveller earns 10-man National League leaders Bromley a replay against League One side Bristol Rovers.
results.shortTitle: Pirates taken to replay by 10-man Bromley
results.title: Bristol Rovers 1-1 Bromley: Chris Bush's late leveller earns National League leaders replay

results.description: Relive all the action from Sunday's 10 FA Cup first-round ties, including Maldon & Tiptree stunning Leyton Orient.
results.title: FA Cup: Sunday's first-round action as it happened

results.description: Listen to local radio commentaries from nine FA Cup first-round ties.
results.shortTitle: Listen: Hayes & Yeading v Oxford United
results.title: Listen: FA Cup first round commentaries including Bristol Rovers & Leyton Orient

results.description: Bristol Rovers survive Rochdale's second-half onslaught to hang on for victory at the Crown Oil Arena.
results.title: Rochdale 1-2 Bristol Rovers

results.description: Bristol Rovers salvage a point as keeper Craig MacGillivray's injury-time own goal robs Portmsouth of an away win.
results.title: Bristol Rovers 2-2 Portsmouth

results.description: Bolton boss Keith Hill credits his players' efforts in adversity after their first league win of the season at Bristol Rovers.
results.shortTitle: Bolton get 'deserved' first win of season
results.title: Bristol Rovers 0-2 Bolton Wanderers: Keith Hill's Trotters earn first win of season

results.description: Doncaster end a four-game winless run and halted Bristol Rovers' hot streak.
results.title: Doncaster Rovers 2-0 Bristol Rovers

results.description: Tom Davies' first goal for Bristol Rovers sees his team beat MK Dons to go up to fourth in League One.
results.title: Bristol Rovers 1-0 Milton Keynes Dons

results.description: The EFL and their charity partner Mind are using street art in a bid to encourage conversations about mental health.
results.shortTitle: EFL and Mind launch street art campaign
results.title: World Mental Health Day: Street art campaign launched by English Football League

results.description: Defender Stuart Taylor played 546 times for Bristol Rovers between 1965 and 1980.
results.shortTitle: Club 'saddened' as record appearance player dies
results.title: Stuart Taylor: Bristol Rovers' club-record holder dies

thumbnail.altText: Former Bristol Rovers defender Stuart Taylor

results.description: Jonson Clarke-Harris scores his seventh league goal of the season as Bristol Rovers beat Rotherham at the Memorial Stadium.
results.title: Bristol Rovers 1-0 Rotherham United

results.description: Manchester City Under-21s become the first team to reach the EFL Trophy knockout stages with a 2-1 win at Bradford City.
results.shortTitle: Man City U21s go through in EFL Trophy
results.title: Leasing.com Trophy: Man City U21s beat Bradford to go through

results.description: Bristol Rovers come from behind to secure a 3-1 victory at winless AFC Wimbledon.
results.title: AFC Wimbledon 1-3 Bristol Rovers

results.description: Thomas O'Connor fires an 83rd-minute equaliser to earn Gillingham a point at Bristol Rovers in League One.
results.title: Bristol Rovers 1-1 Gillingham

results.description: Lincoln begin life without Danny Cowley in underwhelming fashion with a home defeat by Bristol Rovers.
results.title: Lincoln City 0-1 Bristol Rovers

results.description: Ten-man Accrington Stanley battle back to earn a thrilling League One draw at Bristol Rovers.
results.title: Bristol Rovers 3-3 Accrington Stanley

results.description: Burton Albion score two late goals through Lucas Akins and Ryan Edwards to beat Bristol Rovers.
results.title: Burton Albion 2-0 Bristol Rovers

results.description: Bristol Rovers condemn homophobic chants from some of their fans towards Brighton & Hove Albion supporters.
results.shortTitle: Rovers call out fans' homophobic chants
results.title: Bristol Rovers express 'strong disapproval' of fans' homophobic chants

results.description: Bristol Rovers centre-back Alfie Kilgour signs a new contract with the League One club.
results.shortTitle: Kilgour signs new Bristol Rovers deal
results.title: Alfie Kilgour: Bristol Rovers centre-back signs new contract
